# [Interview #79: DragonCon SciFi Channel Chat, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=79#25)

#### Gurney

How do you keep a series this complex together in your mind?

#### Robert Jordan

Nothing that any genius couldn't do.
